overview: Nazar√© holds a gem which was only discovered ten years ago. Now known for hosting the biggest waves in the world this small Portuguese fishing village welcomes the world's surfing elite to challenge these monster waves. Among them a French woman named Justine Dupont who continues to chart her way forward to become the world's best surfer. This documentary will take a close look into her daily life, in the center of an environment mainly reserved for men. Experience for the first time an in-depth behind the scenes of the first mixed surfing world championships.
title: Enfer & Paradis
